DOC.brief_summary: EGAST 2008 prospective , non interventional , multicentric study ( approximately 2000 isolate 15- 20 site ) . Objectives : - Comparison antimicrobial susceptibility use disc-diffusion method - Assessing prevalence beta-lactamase produce strain among clinical isolates obtain hospital in-patients
DOC.brief_title: Assessing Prevalence Of Beta Lactamase Production From Clinical Isolates Of Hospitalized Patients And Comparison Of Antibiotic Susceptibility Patterns
DOC.criteria: Isolates ( specify observational plan ) hospitalise patient Isolates obtain outpatient include study . Isolates repeat culture perform inpatient followup previously recruit study exclude . Isolates identify commensal contaminant exclude
